00060 class EGS_LOCAL EGS_GeometryPrivate {
00061 public:
00062 
00063     int nnow, ntot;
00064     EGS_BaseGeometry **geoms;
00065     vector<string> media;
00066     vector<EGS_Library *> glibs;
00067     static string geom_delimeter;
00068     static string libkey;
00069     static string create_key;
00070     string dso_path;
00071 
00072     EGS_GeometryPrivate() : nnow(0), ntot(0), geoms(0) {
00073         //egsInformation("EGS_GeometryPrivate() at 0x%x\n",this);
00074         setUp();
00075     };
00076 
00077     EGS_GeometryPrivate(const EGS_GeometryPrivate &p) :
00078         nnow(0), ntot(0), geoms(0) {
00079         //egsInformation("EGS_GeometryPrivate(0x%x) at 0x%x\n",&p,this);
00080         setUp();
00081     };
00082 
00083     void setUp() {
00084         char *hhouse = getenv("HEN_HOUSE");
00085         if (!hhouse) {
00086             egsFatal("Environment variable HEN_HOUSE must be defined\n");
00087         }
00088         dso_path = hhouse;
00089 #if defined WIN32 && !defined CYGWIN
00090         char c = '\\';
00091 #else
00092         char c = '/';
00093 #endif
00094         if (dso_path[dso_path.size()-1] != c) {
00095             dso_path += c;
00096         }
00097         //dso_path += "geometry"; dso_path += c;
00098         dso_path += "egs++";
00099         dso_path += c;
00100         dso_path += "dso";
00101         dso_path += c;
00102         dso_path += CONFIG_NAME;
00103     };
00104 
00105     ~EGS_GeometryPrivate() {
00106         //egsInformation("Destructing EGS_GeometryPrivate at 0x%x, "
00107         //        "ntot=%d nnow=%d\n",this,ntot,nnow);
00108         if (!ntot) {
00109             return;
00110         }
00111         clearGeometries();
00112         delete [] geoms;
00113         //egsInformation("Deleting geometry libs\n");
00114         {
00115             for (unsigned int j=0; j<glibs.size(); j++) {
00116                 delete glibs[j];
00117             }
00118         }
00119     };
00120 
00121     void clearGeometries() {
00122         media.clear();
00123         if (!ntot) {
00124             return;
00125         }
00126         int j = 0, iloop = 0;
00127         while (nnow > 0) {
00128             if (geoms[j]->deref() == -1) {
00129                 delete geoms[j];
00130             }
00131             else {
00132                 geoms[j++]->ref();
00133             }
00134             if (j >= nnow && nnow) {
00135                 j = 0;
00136                 ++iloop;
00137                 if (iloop > 20) egsWarning("~EGS_GeometryPrivate(): failed "
00138                                                "to delete all geometries after 20 loops!\n");
00139                 break;
00140             }
00141         }
00142     };
00143 
00144     void grow(int ngrow) {
00145         ntot += ngrow;
00146         EGS_BaseGeometry **tmp = new EGS_BaseGeometry* [ntot];
00147         for (int j=0; j<nnow; j++) {
00148             tmp[j] = geoms[j];
00149         }
00150         if (geoms) {
00151             delete [] geoms;
00152         }
00153         geoms = tmp;
00154     };
00155 
00156     int addGeometry(EGS_BaseGeometry *g) {
00157         if (!g) {
00158             return -1;
00159         }
00160         for (int j=0; j<nnow; j++)
00161             if (geoms[j]->getName() == g->getName()) {
00162                 return -1;
00163             }
00164         if (nnow >= ntot) {
00165             grow(10);
00166         }
00167         geoms[nnow++] = g;
00168         return nnow-1;
00169 
00170     };
00171 
00172     void removeGeometry(EGS_BaseGeometry *g) {
00173         for (int j=0; j<nnow; j++) {
00174             if (geoms[j] == g) {
00175                 geoms[j] = geoms[--nnow];
00176                 break;
00177             }
00178         }
00179     };
00180 
00181     EGS_BaseGeometry *getGeometry(const string &name) {
00182         for (int j=0; j<nnow; j++)
00183             if (geoms[j]->getName() == name) {
00184                 return geoms[j];
00185             }
00186         return 0;
00187     };
00188 
00189     int addMedium(const string &Name) {
00190         if (EGS_Input::compare(Name,"vacuum")) {
00191             return -1;
00192         }
00193         for (unsigned int j=0; j<media.size(); j++)
00194             if (media[j] == Name) {
00195                 return j;
00196             }
00197         media.push_back(Name);
00198         return media.size()-1;
00199     };
00200 
00201     int getMediumIndex(const string &Name) {
00202         for (unsigned int j=0; j<media.size(); j++)
00203             if (media[j] == Name) {
00204                 return j;
00205             }
00206         return -1;
00207     };
00208 
00209     int nMedia() const {
00210         return media.size();
00211     };
00212 
00213     const char *getMediumName(int ind) const {
00214         if (ind < 0 || ind > media.size()-1) {
00215             return 0;
00216         }
00217         return media[ind].c_str();
00218     };
00219 
00220     EGS_BaseGeometry *createSingleGeometry(EGS_Input *i);
00221 
00222 };
00223 
00224 class EGS_LOCAL EGS_PrivateGeometryLists {
00225 public:
00226     EGS_PrivateGeometryLists() : nnow(0), ntot(0) {
00227         addList(new EGS_GeometryPrivate);
00228     };
00229     ~EGS_PrivateGeometryLists() {
00230         //egsInformation("Deleting geometry lists\n");
00231         if (ntot > 0) {
00232             for (int j=0; j<nnow; j++) {
00233                 //egsInformation("Deleting list %d\n",j);
00234                 delete lists[j];
00235             }
00236             delete [] lists;
00237         }
00238     };
00239     int size() const {
00240         return nnow;
00241     };
00242     EGS_GeometryPrivate &operator[](int j) {
00243         return *lists[j];
00244     };
00245     void addList(EGS_GeometryPrivate *l) {
00246         if (!l) {
00247             return;
00248         }
00249         if (nnow >= ntot) {
00250             EGS_GeometryPrivate **tmp = new EGS_GeometryPrivate* [ntot+10];
00251             for (int j=0; j<nnow; j++) {
00252                 tmp[j] = lists[j];
00253             }
00254             if (ntot > 0) {
00255                 delete [] lists;
00256             }
00257             lists = tmp;
00258             ntot += 10;
00259         }
00260         lists[nnow++] = l;
00261     };
00262     int nnow, ntot;
00263     EGS_GeometryPrivate **lists;
00264 };

00267 string EGS_GeometryPrivate::libkey = "library";
00268 string EGS_GeometryPrivate::create_key = "createGeometry";

00283 #ifndef SKIP_DOXYGEN
00284 EGS_BaseGeometry *EGS_GeometryPrivate::createSingleGeometry(EGS_Input *i) {
00285     string libname;
00286     if (!i) {
00287         egsWarning("createSingleGeometry: null input?\n");
00288         return 0;
00289     }
00290     int error = i->getInput(EGS_GeometryPrivate::libkey,libname);
00291     if (error) {
00292         egsWarning("createSingleGeometry: input item %s does not define the"
00293                    " geometry library\n",i->name());
00294         return 0;
00295     }
00296     EGS_Library *lib = 0;
00297     for (unsigned int j=0; j<glibs.size(); j++) {
00298         if (libname == glibs[j]->libraryName()) {
00299             lib = glibs[j];
00300             break;
00301         }
00302     }
00303     if (!lib) {
00304         lib = new EGS_Library(libname.c_str(),dso_path.c_str());
00305         lib->load();
00306         if (!lib->isLoaded()) {
00307             egsWarning("createSingleGeometry: Failed to load library '%s' from"
00308                        " %s\n",libname.c_str(),dso_path.c_str());
00309             return 0;
00310         }
00311         glibs.push_back(lib);
00312     }
00313     EGS_GeometryCreationFunction gcreate = (EGS_GeometryCreationFunction)
00314                                            lib->resolve(EGS_GeometryPrivate::create_key.c_str());
00315     if (!gcreate) {
00316         egsWarning("createSingleGeometry: failed to resolve the %s function\n"
00317                    "  in geometry library %s\n",
00318                    EGS_GeometryPrivate::create_key.c_str(),lib->libraryName());
00319         return 0;
00320     }
00321     EGS_BaseGeometry *g = gcreate(i);
00322     if (!g) {
00323         egsWarning("createSingleGeometry: got null geometry\n");
00324         egsWarning("  library: %s\n",lib->libraryName());
00325         egsWarning("  input:\n");
00326         i->print(4,cerr);
00327         return 0;
00328     }
00329     if (!addGeometry(g)) {
00330         egsWarning("createSingleGeometry: failed to add the geometry %s\n"
00331                    " to the list of geometries. This implies that a geometry with"
00332                    " this name already exists\n",g->getName().c_str());
00333         delete g;
00334         return 0;
00335     }
00336     return g;
00337 
00338 }
00339 #endif

00341 //static EGS_LOCAL vector<EGS_GeometryPrivate> egs_geometries;
00342 static EGS_LOCAL EGS_PrivateGeometryLists egs_geometries;
00343 
00344 EGS_Float EGS_BaseGeometry::howfarToOutside(int ireg, const EGS_Vector &x,
00345         const EGS_Vector &u) {
00346     if (ireg < 0) {
00347         return 0;
00348     }
00349     EGS_Vector xx(x);
00350     EGS_Float ttot = 0;
00351     while (1) {
00352         EGS_Float t = 1e30;
00353         int inew = howfar(ireg,xx,u,t);
00354         ttot += t;
00355         if (inew < 0) {
00356             break;
00357         }
00358         xx += u*t;
00359         ireg = inew;
00360     }
00361     return ttot;
00362 }

00364 void EGS_BaseGeometry::setActiveGeometryList(int list) {
00365     int n = egs_geometries.size();
00366     //egsInformation("EGS_BaseGeometry::setActiveGeometryList: size=%d list=%d\n",
00367     //        n,list);
00368     for (int j=n; j<=list; j++)
00369         //egs_geometries.push_back(EGS_GeometryPrivate());
00370     {
00371         egs_geometries.addList(new EGS_GeometryPrivate);
00372     }
00373     active_glist = list;
00374 }

00387 
00388 EGS_BaseGeometry::EGS_BaseGeometry(const string &Name) : nreg(0), name(Name),
00389     med(-1), region_media(0), nref(0), debug(false), is_convex(true),
00390     has_rho_scaling(false), rhor(0), bproperty(0), bp_array(0) {
00391     if (!egs_geometries.size()) {
00392         egs_geometries.addList(new EGS_GeometryPrivate);
00393     }
00394     if (!name.size()) {
00395         name = getUniqueName();
00396     }
00397     if (egs_geometries[active_glist].addGeometry(this) < 0)
00398         egsFatal("EGS_BaseGeometry::EGS_BaseGeometry:\n"
00399                  "  a geometry with name %s alread exists\n",name.c_str());
00400 }

00402 EGS_BaseGeometry::~EGS_BaseGeometry() {
00403     if (region_media) {
00404         delete [] region_media;
00405     }
00406     if (rhor && has_rho_scaling) {
00407         delete [] rhor;
00408     }
00409     if (bp_array) {
00410         delete [] bp_array;
00411     }
00412     //egsInformation("Deleting geometry at 0x%x, list=%d\n",this,active_glist);
00413     egs_geometries[active_glist].removeGeometry(this);
00414 }

00424 void EGS_BaseGeometry::setMedium(const string &Name) {

00426     if (region_media)
00427         for (int j=0; j<nreg; j++) {
00428             region_media[j] = med;
00429         }
00430 }

00440 void EGS_BaseGeometry::setMedium(int istart, int iend, const string &Name,
00441                                  int delta) {
00442     int imed = egs_geometries[active_glist].addMedium(Name);
00443     setMedium(istart,iend,imed,delta);
00444 }
00445 
00446 void EGS_BaseGeometry::setMedium(int istart, int iend, int imed, int delta) {
00447     if (nreg <= 1) {
00448         med = imed;
00449         return;
00450     }
00451     if (delta <= 0) {
00452         return;
00453     }
00454     if (istart < 0) {
00455         istart = 0;
00456     }
00457     if (iend > nreg-1) {
00458         iend = nreg-1;
00459     }
00460     if (!region_media) {
00461         region_media = new short [nreg];
00462         for (int j=0; j<nreg; j++) {
00463             region_media[j] = med;
00464         }
00465     }
00466     for (int j=istart; j<=iend; j+=delta) {
00467         region_media[j] = imed;
00468     }
00469 }

00481 }
00482 
00483 EGS_BaseGeometry *EGS_BaseGeometry::createGeometry(EGS_Input *input) {
00484     EGS_Input *ginput = input;
00485     bool delete_it = false;
00486     if (!input->isA(egs_geometries[active_glist].geom_delimeter)) {
00487         ginput = input->takeInputItem(egs_geometries[active_glist].geom_delimeter);
00488         delete_it = true;
00489     }
00490     if (!ginput) {
00491         egsWarning("EGS_BaseGeometry::createGeometry: no geometry specification"
00492                    " in this input\n");
00493         return 0;
00494     }
00495     EGS_Input *ij;
00496     bool error = false;
00497     while ((ij = ginput->takeInputItem("geometry")) != 0) {
00498         EGS_BaseGeometry *g = egs_geometries[active_glist].createSingleGeometry(ij);
00499         if (!g) {
00500             error = true;
00501         }
00502         delete ij;
00503     }
00504     if (error) {
00505         egsFatal("EGS_BaseGeometry::createGeometry: errors during geometry"
00506                  " definition\n");
00507         return 0;
00508     }
00509     string sim_geom;
00510     int err = ginput->getInput("simulation geometry",sim_geom);
00511     if (err) {
00512         egsWarning("EGS_BaseGeometry::createGeometry: missing/wrong keyword"
00513                    " 'simulation geometry'\n");
00514         return 0;
00515     }
00516     EGS_BaseGeometry *g = egs_geometries[active_glist].getGeometry(sim_geom);
00517     if (!g) egsWarning("EGS_BaseGeometry::createGeometry: a geometry with "
00518                            "the name %s does not exist\n",sim_geom.c_str());
00519     if (delete_it) {
00520         delete ginput;
00521     }
00522     return g;
00523 }
00524 
00525 string EGS_BaseGeometry::getUniqueName() {
00526     sprintf(buf_unique,"geometry%d",egs_geometries[active_glist].nnow);
00527     string result(buf_unique);
00528     return result;
00529 }
00530 
00531 void EGS_BaseGeometry::setName(EGS_Input *i) {
00532     int err = i->getInput("name",name);
00533     if (err) {
00534         name = getUniqueName();
00535     }
00536     EGS_Input *inp;
00537     int irep=0;
00538     while ((inp = i->takeInputItem("replica"))) {
00539         string typ;
00540         int ncopy;
00541         vector<EGS_Float> trans, trans_o;
00542         vector<EGS_Float> rot_axis;
00543         EGS_Float rot_angle, rot_angle_o;
00544         int err1 = inp->getInput("type",typ);
00545         int err2 = inp->getInput("number of copies",ncopy);
00546         int err3 = inp->getInput("translation delta",trans);
00547         int err3a = inp->getInput("first translation",trans_o);
00548         int err4 = inp->getInput("rotation axis",rot_axis);
00549         int err5 = inp->getInput("rotation delta",rot_angle);
00550         int err5a = inp->getInput("first rotation",rot_angle_o);
00551         bool do_it = true;
00552         int ttype;
00553         if (err1 || err2) {
00554             if (err1) egsWarning("geometry replication: 'type' not defined ->"
00555                                      " ignoring input\n");
00556             if (err2) egsWarning("geometry replication: 'number of copies' "
00557                                      "not defined -> ignoring input\n");
00558             do_it = false;
00559         }
00560         else {
00561             if (ncopy < 1) {
00562                 egsWarning("geometry replication: %d copies?\n",ncopy);
00563                 do_it = false;
00564             }
00565             if (typ == "line") {
00566                 if (trans.size() != 3) {
00567                     egsWarning("geometry replication: got %d inputs for "
00568                                "'translation', need 3\n",trans.size());
00569                     do_it = false;
00570                 }
00571                 else {
00572                     if (err3a) {
00573                         trans_o.push_back(0);
00574                         trans_o.push_back(0);
00575                         trans_o.push_back(0);
00576                     }
00577                 }
00578                 ttype = 0;
00579             }
00580             else if (typ == "rotation") {
00581                 if (rot_axis.size() != 3) {
00582                     egsWarning("geometry replication: got %d inputs for "
00583                                "'rotation axis', need 3\n",rot_axis.size());
00584                     do_it = false;
00585                 }
00586                 if (err4) {
00587                     egsWarning("geometry replication: missing 'rotation delta'"
00588                                " input\n");
00589                     do_it = false;
00590                 }
00591                 if (err5a) {
00592                     rot_angle_o = 0;
00593                 }
00594                 ttype = 1;
00595             }
00596             else {
00597                 egsWarning("geometry replication: unknown replica type %s\n",
00598                            typ.c_str());
00599                 do_it = false;
00600             }
00601         }
00602         if (do_it) {
00603             ++irep;
00604             char buf[1024];
00605             for (int icopy=1; icopy<=ncopy; icopy++) {
00606                 //string content(":start geometry:\n");
00607                 string content;
00608                 content += "    library = egs_gtransformed\n";
00609                 sprintf(buf,"    name = %s_rep%d_%d\n",name.c_str(),irep,icopy);
00610                 content += buf;
00611                 sprintf(buf,"    my geometry = %s\n",name.c_str());
00612                 content += buf;
00613                 content += "    :start transformation:\n";
00614                 if (ttype == 0)
00615                     sprintf(buf,"        translation = %g %g %g\n",
00616                             trans_o[0]+trans[0]*icopy,
00617                             trans_o[1]+trans[1]*icopy,
00618                             trans_o[2]+trans[2]*icopy);
00619                 else
00620                     sprintf(buf,"        rotation = %g %g %g  %g\n",
00621                             rot_axis[0],rot_axis[1],rot_axis[2],
00622                             rot_angle_o+rot_angle*icopy);
00623                 content += buf;
00624                 content += "    :stop transformation:\n";
00625                 //content += ":stop geometry:\n";
00626                 EGS_Input aux;
00627                 aux.setContentFromString(content);
00628                 EGS_BaseGeometry *g =
00629                     EGS_BaseGeometry::createSingleGeometry(&aux);
00630                 if (!g) egsWarning("geometry replication: failed to create"
00631                                        " replica %d of %s\n",icopy,name.c_str());
00632                 //else egsInformation("geometry replication: created replica"
00633                 //       " %s\n",g->getName().c_str());
00634             }
00635         }
00636     }
00637 }
00638 
00639 void EGS_BaseGeometry::printInfo() const {
00640     egsInformation("======================== geometry =====================\n");
00641     egsInformation(" type = %s\n",getType().c_str());
00642     egsInformation(" name = %s\n",getName().c_str());
00643     egsInformation(" number of regions = %d\n",nreg);
00644 }
00645 
00646 void EGS_BaseGeometry::describeGeometries() {
00647     egsInformation("\nThe following geometries are defined:\n\n");
00648     for (int j=0; j<egs_geometries[active_glist].nnow; j++) {
00649         egs_geometries[active_glist].geoms[j]->printInfo();
00650     }
00651 }

00653 void EGS_BaseGeometry::setMedia(EGS_Input *inp) {
00654     EGS_Input *input = inp;
00655     bool delete_it = false;
00656     if (!input->isA("media input")) {
00657         input = inp->takeInputItem("media input");
00658         if (!input) {
00659             return;
00660         }
00661         // i.e., if there is no media related input for this geometry,
00662         // we don't warn as we assume that media will be set from the outside
00663         delete_it = true;
00664     }
00665     vector<string> media_names;
00666     int err = input->getInput("media",media_names);
00667     int *med_ind = 0;
00668     int nmed = media_names.size();
00669     if (!err && nmed > 0) {
00670         med_ind = new int [nmed];
00671         for (int j=0; j<nmed; j++) {
00672             med_ind[j] = egs_geometries[active_glist].addMedium(media_names[j]);
00673         }
00674     }
00675     else {
00676         nmed = nMedia();
00677         if (nmed < 1) {
00678             if (delete_it) {
00679                 delete input;
00680             }
00681             return;
00682         }
00683         med_ind = new int [nmed];
00684         for (int j=0; j<nmed; j++) {
00685             med_ind[j] = j;
00686         }
00687     }
00688     setMedia(input,nmed,med_ind);
00689     setRelativeRho(input);
00690     delete [] med_ind;
00691     if (delete_it) {
00692         delete input;
00693     }
00694 }
00695 
00696 void EGS_BaseGeometry::setMedia(EGS_Input *input, int nmed, const int *mind) {
00697     EGS_Input *i;
00698     med = mind[0];
00699     while ((i = input->takeInputItem("set medium"))) {
00700         vector<int> inp;
00701         int err = i->getInput("set medium",inp);
00702         delete i;
00703         if (!err) {
00704             //if( inp.size() == 2 ) setMedium(inp[0],inp[0]+1,mind[inp[1]]);
00705             if (inp.size() == 2) {
00706                 setMedium(inp[0],inp[0],mind[inp[1]]);
00707             }
00708             else if (inp.size() == 3) {
00709                 setMedium(inp[0],inp[1],mind[inp[2]]);
00710             }
00711             else if (inp.size() == 4) {
00712                 setMedium(inp[0],inp[1],mind[inp[2]],inp[3]);
00713             }
00714             else egsWarning("EGS_BaseGeometry::setMedia(): found %d inputs\n"
00715                                 "in a 'set medium' input. 2 or 3 are allowed\n",inp.size());
00716         }
00717         else egsWarning("EGS_BaseGeometry::setMedia(): wrong 'set medium'"
00718                             " input\n");
00719     }
00720 }
00721 
00722 void EGS_BaseGeometry::setRelativeRho(int start, int end, EGS_Float rho) {
00723     if (start < 0) {
00724         start = 0;
00725     }
00726     if (end >= nreg) {
00727         end = nreg-1;
00728     }
00729     if (end >= start) {
00730         int j;
00731         if (!rhor) {
00732             rhor = new EGS_Float [nreg];
00733             for (j=0; j<nreg; j++) {
00734                 rhor[j] = 1;
00735             }
00736         }
00737         for (j=start; j<=end; j++) {
00738             rhor[j] = rho;
00739         }
00740         has_rho_scaling = true;
00741     }
00742 }
00743 
00744 void EGS_BaseGeometry::setRelativeRho(EGS_Input *input) {
00745     EGS_Input *i;
00746     while ((i = input->takeInputItem("set relative density"))) {
00747         vector<EGS_Float> tmp;
00748         int err = i->getInput("set relative density",tmp);
00749         if (!err) {
00750             if (tmp.size() == 2) {
00751                 int start = (int)(tmp[0]+0.1);
00752                 int end = start;
00753                 setRelativeRho(start,end,tmp[1]);
00754             }
00755             else if (tmp.size() == 3) {
00756                 int start = (int)(tmp[0]+0.1);
00757                 int end = (int)(tmp[1]+0.1);
00758                 setRelativeRho(start,end,tmp[2]);
00759             }
00760             else {
00761                 egsWarning("EGS_BaseGeometry::setRelativeRho(): found %d "
00762                            "inputs in a 'set relative density' input.\n",tmp.size());
00763                 egsWarning("  2 or 3 are allowed => input ignored\n");
00764             }
00765         }
00766         delete i;
00767     }
00768 }
00769 
00770 int EGS_BaseGeometry::computeIntersections(int ireg, int n, const EGS_Vector &X,
00771         const EGS_Vector &u, EGS_GeometryIntersections *isections) {
00772     if (n < 1) {
00773         return -1;
00774     }
00775     int ifirst = 0;
00776     EGS_Float t, ttot = 0;
00777     EGS_Vector x(X);
00778     int imed;
00779     if (ireg < 0) {
00780         t = 1e30;
00781         ireg = howfar(ireg,x,u,t,&imed);
00782         if (ireg < 0) {
00783             return 0;
00784         }
00785         isections[0].t = t;
00786         isections[0].rhof = 1;
00787         isections[0].ireg = -1;
00788         isections[0].imed = -1;
00789         ttot = t;
00790         ++ifirst;
00791         x += u*t;
00792     }
00793     else {
00794         imed = medium(ireg);
00795     }
00796 
00797     for (int j=ifirst; j<n; j++) {
00798         isections[j].imed = imed;
00799         isections[j].rhof = getRelativeRho(ireg);
00800         isections[j].ireg = ireg;
00801         t = 1e30;
00802         int inew = howfar(ireg,x,u,t,&imed);
00803         ttot += t;
00804         isections[j].t = ttot;
00805         if (inew < 0 || inew == ireg) {
00806             return j+1;
00807         }
00808         ireg = inew;
00809         x += u*t;
00810     }
00811 
00812     return ireg >= 0 ? -1 : n;
00813 
00814 }
00815 
00816 void EGS_BaseGeometry::setBooleanProperty(EGS_BPType prop) {
00817     bproperty = prop;
00818     if (bp_array) {
00819         delete [] bp_array;
00820         bp_array = 0;
00821     }
00822 }
00823 
00824 void EGS_BaseGeometry::addBooleanProperty(int bit) {
00825     if (bit < 0 || bit >= 8*sizeof(EGS_BPType)) {
00826         egsWarning("EGS_BaseGeometry::addBooleanProperty: attempt to set the "
00827                    "%d'th bith!\n",bit);
00828         return;
00829     }
00830     EGS_BPType prop = 1 << bit;
00831     bproperty |= prop;
00832     if (bp_array) {
00833         for (int j=0; j<nreg; j++) {
00834             bp_array[j] |= prop;
00835         }
00836     }
00837 }
00838 
00839 void EGS_BaseGeometry::setBooleanProperty(EGS_BPType prop, int start, int end,
00840         int step) {
00841     if (start < 0) {
00842         start = 0;
00843     }
00844     if (end >= nreg) {
00845         end = nreg-1;
00846     }
00847     if (start == 0 && end == nreg-1 && step==1) {
00848         setBooleanProperty(prop);
00849     }
00850     else {
00851         if (!bp_array) {
00852             bp_array = new EGS_BPType [nreg];
00853             for (int j=0; j<nreg; j++) {
00854                 bp_array[j] = 0;
00855             }
00856         }
00857         for (int j=start; j<=end; j+=step) {
00858             bp_array[j] = prop;
00859         }
00860     }
00861 }
00862 
00863 void EGS_BaseGeometry::addBooleanProperty(int bit, int start, int end,
00864         int step) {
00865     if (bit < 0 || bit >= 8*sizeof(EGS_BPType)) {
00866         egsWarning("EGS_BaseGeometry::addBooleanProperty: attempt to set the "
00867                    "%d'th bith!\n",bit);
00868         return;
00869     }
00870     if (start < 0) {
00871         start = 0;
00872     }
00873     if (end >= nreg) {
00874         end = nreg-1;
00875     }
00876     if (start == 0 && end == nreg-1 && step==1) {
00877         addBooleanProperty(bit);
00878     }
00879     else {
00880         EGS_BPType prop = 1 << bit;
00881         if (!bp_array) {
00882             bp_array = new EGS_BPType [nreg];
00883             for (int j=0; j<nreg; j++) {
00884                 bp_array[j] = 0;
00885             }
00886         }
00887         for (int j=start; j<=end; j+=step) {
00888             bp_array[j] |= prop;
00889         }
00890     }
00891 }
00892 
00893 void EGS_BaseGeometry::getLabelRegions(const string &str, vector<int> &regs) {
00894 
00895     // get all regions lists for this named label
00896     for (int i=0; i<labels.size(); i++) {
00897         if (labels[i].name.compare(str) == 0) {
00898             regs.insert(regs.end(), labels[i].regions.begin(), labels[i].regions.end());
00899         }
00900     }
00901 
00902     // sort region list and remove duplicates
00903     sort(regs.begin(), regs.end());
00904     regs.erase(unique(regs.begin(), regs.end()), regs.end());
00905 }

00907 
00908 int EGS_BaseGeometry::setLabels(EGS_Input *input) {
00909     EGS_Input *i;
00910     int labelCount=0;
00911     while ((i = input->takeInputItem("set label"))) {
00912 
00913         // get input string
00914         string inp;
00915         int err = i->getInput("set label",inp);
00916         delete i;
00917 
00918         // bail out on read error
00919         if (err) {
00920             egsWarning("EGS_BaseGeometry::setLabels(): error while reading 'set label' input\n");
00921             return 0;
00922         }
00923 
00924         // set the labels from input string
00925         int nLabel = setLabels(inp);
00926 
00927         // increase label count
00928         labelCount += nLabel;
00929     }
00930 
00931     return labelCount;
00932 }
00933 
00934 
00935 int EGS_BaseGeometry::setLabels(const string &inp) {
00936 
00937     // tokenize input string
00938     vector<string> tokens;
00939     const char *ptr = inp.c_str();
00940     do {
00941         const char *begin = ptr;
00942         while (*ptr != ' ' && *ptr) {
00943             ptr++;
00944         }
00945         tokens.push_back(string(begin, ptr));
00946     }
00947     while (*ptr++ != '\0');
00948 
00949     // bail out if there are no label tokens
00950     if (tokens.size() < 1) {
00951         egsWarning("EGS_BaseGeometry::setLabels(): no label name\n");
00952         return 0;
00953     }
00954 
00955     // parse label into a label class
00956     label lab;
00957     lab.name = tokens[0];
00958     for (int i=1; i<tokens.size(); i++) {
00959         int reg = atoi(tokens[i].c_str());
00960         if (reg < nreg && reg >= 0) {
00961             lab.regions.push_back(reg);
00962         }
00963         else {
00964             egsWarning("EGS_BaseGeometry::setLabels(): label \"%s\": region %d is beyond the number " \
00965                        "of regions in this geometry\n", lab.name.c_str(), reg);
00966         }
00967     }
00968 
00969     // continue if there is no region
00970     if (lab.regions.size() <= 0) {
00971         return 0;
00972     }
00973 
00974     // sort region list and remove duplicates
00975     sort(lab.regions.begin(), lab.regions.end());
00976     lab.regions.erase(unique(lab.regions.begin(), lab.regions.end()), lab.regions.end());
00977 
00978     // push current label onto vector of labels
00979     labels.push_back(lab);
00980 
00981     return 1;
00982 }
